name: Plutos Revenge
description:
Pluto's Revenge

Pluto's Revenge is a game created during Blackthornprod's Game Jam ( 23rd Feb 2019 - 2nd Mar 2019 ), by 2 developers: Michał Kruszewski, Maciej Sawicki and graphic designer: Marta Zajkowska.

Main theme for this jam was "mini planets", so we created a Pluto...who fights his way back to the solar system! 

Game jam has ended, but we didn't stop our work on game, we're still fixing bugs, and adding some additional features.

Be sure to check for new features and other exciting games in the future!

Stay tuned! 
Michał Kruszewski
